definition: A Dream of Red Mansions (first completed edition 1791) by Cao Xueqin 曹雪芹[Cao2 Xue3 qin2], one of the four great novels
surname Hong
red/popular/revolutionary/bonus
surname Lou
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: She played the role of lin daiyu in a shaoxing adaptation of dream of the red chamber.
sentences.chinese: 她在绍兴折子戏中扮演红楼梦的林黛玉。

sentences.english: This park is laid out in imitation of Grand View Garden in "a Dream of Red Mansions".
sentences.chinese: 这个公园是仿照《红楼梦》里的大观园设计的。

sentences.english: Mansions" is one of China's four famous book !"
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道“红楼梦”是中国的四大名著之一。

sentences.english: The non-scientificity of "Textual Research on 'Dream of Red Chamber'" is obvious.
sentences.chinese: 《红楼梦考释》的非科学性是显而易见的。

sentences.english: Lin Daiyu is my favorite character from the "Dream of the Red Mansion".
sentences.chinese: 林黛玉是《红楼梦》中我最喜欢的角色。

sentences.english: Dream of Red Mansions" is a masterwork."
The language of the Dream of Red Mansions is the model of the common language of Chinese in the 18~(th) century.
sentences.chinese: 《红楼梦》语言是十八世纪汉民族共同语的典范。

sentences.english: Is one of the Dream of the Red Chamber , the.
sentences.chinese: 我可以说她可以称的上红楼梦中的王熙凤了。

sentences.english: The novel expressed a warning in the flourishing age of late feudal society.
sentences.chinese: 《红楼梦》是封建社会末期的“盛世危言”。

sentences.english: In The Dream of Red Mansion, Cao Xueqin portrayed a female character-Qin Keqing.
sentences.chinese: 在《红楼梦》中，曹雪芹塑造了秦可卿这位女性。

sentences.english: I can say that she can be called on the Dream of the Red Chamber of Wang Xifeng.
sentences.chinese: 我可以说她可以称的上红楼梦中的王熙凤了。

sentences.english: I have a binding-edition Dream of the Red Chamber. Do you want to read it?
sentences.chinese: 我有一本精装版《红楼梦》，你想不想看？

sentences.english: Dream of Red Mansions is a poem-like novel.
A Dream of Red Mansions is a tragedy evanescence of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 所以说《红楼梦》是一部美的幻灭的悲剧。

sentences.english: Dream of Red Mansions is a great literary work which is profound in thought.
sentences.chinese: 《红楼梦》是一部体大思精的文学著作。

sentences.english: This application contains the first 20 chapters of HongLouMeng in traditional Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本程序包含繁体版《红楼梦》前20回。

definition: Cao Xueqin (c. 1715-c. 1764), accepted author of A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4]
Jia Baoyu, male character in The Dream of Red Mansions, in love with his cousin Lin Daiyu 林黛玉 but obliged to marry Xue Baochai 薛寶釵|薛宝钗
Lin Daiyu, female character in The Dream of Red Mansions, cousin and thwarted lover of Jia Baoyu 賈寶玉|贾宝玉
Xue Baochai, female character in Dream of Red Mansions, married to Jia Baoyu 賈寶玉|贾宝玉
Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus (1617), Ming dynasty vernacular novel, formerly notorious and banned for its sexual content
Romance of the West Chamber by Wang Shifu 王實甫|王实甫[Wang2 Shi2 fu3]
sequel/continuation of a book

the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, namely: A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4], Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], Water Margin 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Prospect Garden/Grand View Garden, a garden in Dream of the Red Chamber
The Scholars, Qing dynasty novel by Wu Jingzi 吳敬梓|吴敬梓[Wu2 Jing4 zi3], an extended satire on the Imperial Examination system
Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio, Qing dynasty book of tales by 蒲松齡|蒲松龄[Pu2 Song1 ling2]
Liu Xinwu (1942-), novelist
"Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions
Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
masterpiece
The Sing-Song Girls of Shanghai by Han Bangqing 韓邦慶|韩邦庆[Han2 Bang1 qing4], long novel of lower life in Classical Chinese and Jiangsu vernacular/translated into Putonghua as 海上花 by Iris Chang
